label: HandleKuau
m: Glad you asked! Kuau is the first digital platform for professional orientation in Brazil.
It targets students in secundary education to help them find the career of their dream.
It took less than one year to go from just an idea to have dozens of partner schools and hundreds of students.
I felt great designing and building it, from the inception all the way to the App Store.
I learned a lot leading a small team of young and smart devs to build a shared know-how.
Also, we have a wonderful koala mascot :koala:
Sounds interesting? I look forward to hear from you!
